h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Upper Pagoda (Level 4)

To the left, you can find the Mani Wheel Shrine and a path to the boss, but there's one last section of the fourth level of the prison we need to complete, which unfortunately means going back to the madness. Be sure to unlock the Shrine regardless so you can teleport back to it easily.

Take the path going right from the wooden beams, and you'll come upon a group of frozen corpses by a raised platform. They'll be smashed to pieces as a new enemy flies down -- a Falcon Fan-Maker.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from "The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm," specifically within the Upper Pagoda (Level 4). It shows a character facing a new enemy, the Falcon Fan-Maker, who has descended onto a snowy platform amidst frozen corpses. The setting is a wintry, rocky landscape, suggesting a challenging encounter in the game. The character appears ready for combat, with game interface elements visible, indicating health and abilities. This image illustrates a pivotal moment in the narrative where the player must confront this enemy to progress further in the walkthrough.
